name: Success Race 3D
description:
First, you will play as a homeless person. Your mission is to monetize, study and work to become rich. Pay attention to stay away and overcome obstacles like party, game, or even sexy girl. These things can make you go bankrupt. Saving your money!!

In fact, you cannot transform from poor to rich immediately. Before becoming a billionaire, you will be homeless, labor, banker and businessman. Your outfit will also transform according to your moneymaker levels. Monetizing and saving ability will determine your house and assets.

HOW TO PLAY
Tap and hold your hand on the screen to run
Run to monetize and make smart choices on the track
Overcome obstacle that cost you money


Quickly download "Money Run 3D" and become a billionaire!!!
publishers: SDRAGON TECHNOLOGY AND INVESTMENT JOINT STOCK COMPANY
